override double Skewness [get]
 Gets the skewness of generated random numbers. Throws NotSupportedException since the value is not defined for this distribution.

Detailed Description

Provides generation of cauchy distributed random numbers.

The implementation of the CauchyLorentzDistribution type bases upon information presented on Wikipedia - Cauchy distribution and Xycoon - Cauchy Distribution.
